categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Toreshi Xach was a male member of the Imperial Guard, the protectors of the Sith Emperor, who was also a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire. Wielding two lightsabers in combat, he was one of the commanders of the Imperial forces during the fighting on Hoth in the Galactic War.

Lord Toreshi Xach was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, which added Conquest Commanders to most of the dual-faction worlds. Xach is a rare NPC enemy, and his place at Frostwake Outpost on Hoth is frequently occupied by a generic Veteran Sith Battlemaster.
